oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cheekwood: history and property description
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 1200 Forest Park Dr., Nashville, Davidson County, TN

Cheekwood was designed by leading American landscape architect Bryant Fleming between 1929 and 1932. Although the estate has been converted into new uses as a botanical garden and art museum beginning in 1959, the property boundaries contain the most significant elements of Fleming's original design, including the mansion and surrounding landscape features.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Botanical gardens; Dwellings; Museums
